is introduced in place of zero for convenience to calculate the next entries of the array which depend upon its value. There are two sign changes in the first column of the Routh array â€” the trivial case is clearly unstable. Using the Routh array one also confirms that stable periodic solutions exist 26 27. Stable limit cycles are generated via Neimark-Sacker bifurcations ( Fig. 1).
